alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Lee; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elmore, northwestern Lee and central Tallapoosa Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Jacksons` Gap to near Kowaliga Bridge. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Jacksons` Gap, Waverly, Martin Dam, Eastern Lake Martin, Liberty City, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Southern Lake Martin, Kowaliga Bridge, Still Waters Resort, Loachapoka, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Blue Creek Marina, Dare Park and Roxana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
